name: "Build and Export Game"
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  export_web:
    name: Export Godot Web
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup Godot
        uses: firebelley/godot-export@v4
        with:
          godot_version: 4.3
          export_templates_version: 4.3
          relative_project_path: .
          export_debug: false
          export_presets_path: export_presets.cfg

      - name: Upload Export
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: web
          path: build/Web/
